channel.title: Hosting a site from home. [Problem]
channel.description:
Sup guys , i come here to ask a question.
I have portforwarted all ports i need and they are open now.I started apache (tried WAMP also) and went to my no-ip domain to check if it is online. I always get this error :"The connection to the server was reset while the page was loading."
Please help me!!

item.title: Hosting a site from home. [Problem]
item.dc:creator: @TheCyberMan TheCyberMan
item.description:
@TheCyberMan wrote:

You need have it not reset while the page is loading.

Glad I could help

Read full topic

item.title: Hosting a site from home. [Problem]
item.dc:creator: @nicks nicks
item.description:
@nicks wrote:

I could probably help you if you gave me more information on what you are trying to do.

Read full topic
